class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Contact Lori Teague for a permission number, lteague@emory.edu
course_description: This course develops communicative, leadership, and creative skills while preparing the student for his/her role as a dance educator. Movement is developed as a kinesthetic tool for learning. Content includes the history of dance education, educational theories, development of original lesson plans, and practical teaching experiences in the Atlanta community.
sections: Class Nbr: 3135, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: L. Teague, Status: Open
